description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Smash bad dudes! Rescue hot chicks! Learn new moves! Level up! Bash your way through all 50 levels of the world's biggest brawler! Unlock 15 playable characters!
